text: Nocardioides daejeonensis is a gram-positive, denitrifying, rod-shaped, aerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus Nocardioides that has been isolated from a sewage disposal plant at Daejeon, South Korea.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides daejeonensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase daejeonensis Category:Bacteria described in 2012
title: Nocardioides daejeonensis
